patthana24.6:1.1_0: Nahetuṁ nasārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu sārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:2.1_0: Nahetuṁ naanārammaṇaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu anārammaṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:3.1_0: Nahetuṁ nocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:4.1_0: Nahetuṁ nanocittaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:5.1_0: Nahetuṁ nacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:6.1_0: Nahetuṁ naacetasikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu acetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:7.1_0: Nahetuṁ nacittasampayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cittasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:8.1_0: Nahetuṁ nacittavippayuttaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu cittavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:9.1_0: Nahetuṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cittasaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:10.1_0: Nahetuṁ nacittavisaṁsaṭṭhaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu cittavisaṁsaṭṭho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:11.1_0: Nahetuṁ nocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …
patthana24.6:12.1_0: Nahetuṁ nanocittasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu nocittasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:13.1_0: Nahetuṁ nocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:14.1_0: Nahetuṁ nanocittasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nocittasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:15.1_0: Nahetuṁ nacittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:16.1_0: Nahetuṁ nanocittānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nocittānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:17.1_0: Nahetuṁ nacittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:18.1_0: Nahetuṁ nanocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhāno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:19.1_0: Nahetuṁ nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:20.1_0: Nahetuṁ nanocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānasahabhū dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:21.1_0: Nahetuṁ nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu cittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:22.1_0: Nahetuṁ nanocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattiṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu nocittasaṁsaṭṭhasamuṭṭhānānuparivattī dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:23.1_0: Nahetuṁ naajjhattikaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:24.1_0: Nahetuṁ nabāhiraṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu bāhiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:25.1_0: Nahetuṁ naupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu upādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:26.1_0: Nahetuṁ nanoupādā dhammaṁ paṭicca hetu noupādā dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
patthana24.6:27.1_0: Nahetuṁ naupādinno dhammo hetussa upādinnassa dhammassa ārammaṇapaccayena paccayo.
patthana24.6:28.1_0: Nahetuṁ naanupādinnaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nahetu anupādinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
